expectation-text: As a parent, what do you expect from the Homework and Lesson workshop of La Maison d'Aurore (to be specified)?
needs-text: We are here to support you every day in your role as a parent: how could we help you? (listening, training, conferences, themes, etc.)
implication-text: Your involvement is important for the development of your child: do you have talents?
availability-collation: Prepare or serve the snack for children?
interests: Would you be interested in participating in other activities of La Maison d'Aurore? (reception, secretariat, kitchen ...)
